new1.name: Image Text Block Image Position
new1.instructions: This designates the position of the image in the row. Left will place the image to the left and the content to the right. Right will place the image to the right and the content to the left.

new6.name: Image Text Block CTA Text
new6.instructions: *Leave this field blank if you do not want the content area to have a CTA.

new7.name: Image Text Block CTA URL
new7.instructions: *Leave this field blank if you do not want the content area to have a CTA.

fields.name: CTA Text
fields.instructions: This is the text that will appear in your Call To Action

fields.name: CTA URL
fields.instructions: This is the url to where your Call To Action will link.

fields.name: Discipline Category
fields.instructions: Select the discipline for which you want to display the 3 most recent article entries.

fields.name: Display USA Cycling Badge
fields.instructions: Toggle switch for USA Cycling badge.

new8.name: Card CTA HREF Target
new8.instructions: Whether the CTA should open in a new browser tab or not (default is yes).

new9.name: GA Override Value
new9.instructions: This is the "event" value sent to Google Analytics when the associated CTA is clicked (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/analyticsjs/events). Please avoid using spaces or special characters.

fields.name: Href Target
fields.instructions:
Should the CTA link open in a new window or same window?
new window = on
same window = off

new5.name: GA Override Value
new5.instructions: This is the "event" value sent to Google Analytics when the associated CTA is clicked (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/analyticsjs/events). Please avoid using spaces or special characters.

new8.name: Slide CTA HREF Target
new8.instructions: Whether the CTA should open in a new browser tab or not (default is yes).

new9.name: GA Override Value
new9.instructions: This is the "event" value sent to Google Analytics when the associated CTA is clicked (https://developers.google.com/analytics/devguides/collection/analyticsjs/events). Please avoid using spaces or special characters.

fields.name: Section Title Background Text
fields.instructions: This field must contain more than X characters.

fields.name: Team Additional Heading
fields.instructions: This field will appear above the featured directors section.

fields.name: Team Featured Heading
fields.instructions: This field will appear above the additional directors section.

new6.name: Left or Right Image & Text Feature Widget
